availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Moses Preston Jr. (Johnson County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Moses Preston Sr. and Elizabeth Haney Preston. Married to Jane Preston. Father of Virginia Preston and John M. Preston. Married to Louisa Hager Preston. Clerk employed by his father, Moses Preston Sr., in Johnson County in 1850. Merchant in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 81A.
